description: Observations to adjoining borough for the demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 2, part 5, part 6, part 7, part 8, part 9 and part 11 storey building to provide new education facility comprising 5,528 sq.m teaching accommodation and associated facilities (D1 class use); 541 student rooms; 376 sq.m of flexible retail/restaurant use (Class A1/A3 use) with operating hours of 07.00 to 24.00 hours; together with cycle parking, refuse and recycling and external landscaping.
decision_conditions: The London Borough of Islington do not wish to make any comments on the application at this time.
